001.comments: If this course is FULL or BLOCKED and you wish to be added to the WAITLIST, please email the Department Secretary thtr.sec@ubc.ca. Please include in your SUBJECT line Waitlist and Course Subject and Number and Section. Thank you.Priority will be given to BFA Design /Production and BA Theatre majors who have successfully completed the pre-requisite.

description: Complex problems and selected historical studies in costume design.
